welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castelli Calepio, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
